name: Defence to death
description: "Defence to death" - game in genre "Tower Defence". Defend Your castle from monster! Show Your's strength and wisdom.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and newer Processor: Athlon 2 X3 450 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce EN9600 GT Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP and newer Processor: AMD fx6300 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 750ti Storage: 1 GB available space
